About Me

I'm a software engineer focused on building robust, scalable applications with modern architectures and best practices.

Clean Architecture

Building maintainable systems with clear separation of concerns and domain-driven design principles.

Domain-Driven Design

Modeling complex business domains with bounded contexts, aggregates, and ubiquitous language.

Test-Driven Development

Writing tests first to ensure code quality, better design, and confidence in refactoring.

Continuous Learning

Software Engineering student (Class of 2029), always exploring new technologies and patterns.
